location.description: Where the error occurred, e.g. 'body.items[3].tags' or 'path.thing-id'

value.description: The value at the given location

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.
examples: Property foo is required but is missing.

errors.description: Optional list of individual error details

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. This value should not change between occurrences of the error.

type.description: A URI reference to human-readable documentation for the error.

info.description: Production-ready RESTful service for US and Canadian sales tax data lookup
info.title: ZipTax API

get.description: Returns usage metrics for the authenticated account
Returns basic tax rate information with 8 fields including combined rates
Returns detailed tax breakdown with 16 fields including use tax rates
Returns tax rates with same structure as v2.0 (compatibility version)
Returns tax rates with multi-district support (22+ fields)
Activates v4.0 features for the account

Returns comprehensive tax rates with geocoding support, multi-district breakdown,
			and Tennessee Single Article Tax calculations. Supports both USA and Canada.

parameters.description: Single Article Tax item total for Tennessee
parameters.name: sat_item_total

schema.description: Single Article Tax item total for Tennessee

get.description: Returns the health status of the API and its components
Returns system metadata including version and environment information

tags.description: Tax data and TIC code operations
tags.name: Data
